  <script>
    function showPage(pageId) {
      const pages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
      pages.forEach(page => page.classList.remove('active'));
      document.getElementById(pageId).classList.add('active');
      window.scrollTo({top: 0, behavior: 'smooth'});
    }

    const form = document.getElementById('farmForm');
    const adviceBox = document.getElementById('adviceBox');

    form.addEventListener('submit', function(event) {
      event.preventDefault();

      const animal = document.getElementById('animalType').value;
      const dosage = parseFloat(document.getElementById('dosage').value);
      const withdrawal = parseInt(document.getElementById('withdrawal').value);
      const antimicrobial = document.getElementById('antimicrobial').value;

      let advice = `<h3>Farm Report & Prototype Advice</h3>`;
      advice += `<p><strong>Animal:</strong> ${animal}</p>`;
      advice += `<p><strong>Antimicrobial:</strong> ${antimicrobial}</p>`;

      if (dosage > 20) {
        advice += `<p>‚ö†Ô∏è The dosage seems high. Consult a veterinarian to ensure it aligns with recommended levels for ${animal}.</p>`;
      } else {
        advice += `<p>‚úÖ Dosage appears to be within safe limits for ${animal}. Continue monitoring feed and health conditions.</p>`;
      }

      if (withdrawal < 5) {
        advice += `<p>‚ö†Ô∏è Withdrawal period is too short. Ensure at least 5-7 days before milk/meat processing to meet MRL standards.</p>`;
      } else {
        advice += `<p>‚úÖ Withdrawal period is appropriate. Follow hygiene and monitoring protocols strictly.</p>`;
      }

      advice += `<p>üß† Always maintain detailed records of AMU and seek professional veterinary guidance for sustainable farming.</p>`;

      adviceBox.innerHTML = advice;
      adviceBox.style.display = 'block';
    });
  </script>
